meanings.definition: A strip of leather, cardboard, or other material used to mark one's place in a book.
meanings.sent1: I always use a bookmark to keep my place in my favorite novel.
meanings.sent2: She found an old bookmark with a beautiful design in her library book.
meanings.sent3: The bookmark fell out of the book and landed on the cat's head, making it look like a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: Her bookmark was like a loyal friend, always there to guide her back to the story.
meanings.sent5: The bookmark, with its frayed edges and faded color, held memories of countless reading sessions.

meanings.definition: A digital marker placed in an electronic document or website for quick access.
meanings.sent1: I added a bookmark to the webpage so I can easily find it later.
meanings.sent2: The bookmark on my browser helps me keep track of important sites.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally clicked on the bookmark for a recipe website instead of his work document.
meanings.sent4: Her bookmark for the online store was like a shortcut to her favorite shopping place.
meanings.sent5: The bookmark on the screen glowed like a beacon, guiding him to the information he needed.
